description: The Rides.jsx file defines a React component for the 'Rides' page, managing ride offers and requests, including creation, cancellation, and confirmation functionalities. It integrates with an external API client and uses several child components for displaying forms and lists.

methods.name: reload
methods.description: Fetches meta information, ride offers, and ride requests from API; updates state accordingly.

methods.name: onOfferCreated
methods.description: Callback to handle creation of a new ride offer; appends it to the offers list.

methods.name: onRequestCreated
methods.description: Callback to handle creation of a new ride request; appends it to the requests list.

methods.name: onCancelOffer
methods.description: Cancels a ride offer via API and updates the offers list.

methods.name: onCancelRequest
methods.description: Cancels a ride request via API, refreshes offers list.

methods.name: onConfirmRequest
methods.description: Confirms a ride request via API, updates requests and offers lists.
